channel.title: Mudclient 140
channel.description:
Did anyone else know that mudclient 140 contained the registration page still? and a lost password button.
http://i.imgur.com/nYQiT.png http://i.imgur.com/SsTTq.png http://i.imgur.com/VABeZ.png
looks kinda cool imo :p

item.title: Mudclient 140
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Lothy:

Why don’t you guys focus on having just one solid client/server pair that isn’t hampered by performance issues and erroneous behaviour?

To be honest, i picked mc 140 randomly, i just wanted to refactor a client

Read full topic

item.title: Mudclient 140
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:7, topic:470362”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=587790.msg4170222#msg4170222 date=1354220531]
Community should create a mudclient dump with knowledge from each mc that shows the ‘history’ and progression to where the rsc client is at today.
[/quote]Yeah I thought of that, but it would take 999 time, besides the clients pretty much ought to be refactored to use same names everywhere for it to not be hard as hell[/quote]

Would probably be in different categories like “history of the login screen” or “history of character design” or “history of networking”

Read full topic

item.title: Mudclient 140
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

nacional:

that’s pretty cool. Any signs of the 5 recovery questions?

yea i think they’re there, i found this too

au.ug("Security tip of the day", 256, i1, 1, 0xff0000); i1 += 15; if(bdb == 0) { au.ug("Don't tell ANYONE your password or recovery questions!", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; au.ug("Not even people claiming to be Jagex staff.", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; } if(bdb == 1) { au.ug("Never enter your password or recovery questions into ANY", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; au.ug("website other than this one - Not even if it looks similar.", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; } if(bdb == 2) { au.ug("Don't use RuneScape cheats, helpers, or automaters.", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; au.ug("These programs WILL steal your password.", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; } if(bdb == 3) { au.ug("Watch out for fake emails, and fake staff. Real staff", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; au.ug("will NEVER ask you for your password or recovery questions!", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; } if(bdb == 4) { au.ug("Use a password your friends won't guess. Do NOT use your name!", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; au.ug("Choose a unique password which you haven't used anywhere else", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; } if(bdb == 5) { au.ug("If possible only play runescape from your own computer", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; au.ug("Other machines could have been tampered with to steal your pass", 256, i1, 1, 0xffffff); i1 += 15; }

edit: ye found recovery questions

[code=java] public void ul()
{
afb = new g(au, 100);
int i1 = 8;
bfb = afb.jd(256, i1, “@yel@Please provide 5 security questions in case you lose your password”, 1, true);
i1 += 22;
afb.jd(256, i1, “If you ever lose your password, you will need these to prove you own your account.”, 1, true);
i1 += 13;
afb.jd(256, i1, “Your answers are encrypted and are ONLY used for password recovery purposes.”, 1, true);
i1 += 22;
afb.jd(256, i1, “@ora@IMPORTANT:@whi@ To recover your password you must give the EXACT same answers you”, 1, true);
i1 += 13;
afb.jd(256, i1, “give here. If you think you might forget an answer, or someone else could guess the”, 1, true);
i1 += 13;
afb.jd(256, i1, “answer, then press the ‘different question’ button to get a better question.”, 1, true);
i1 += 35;
for(int j1 = 0; j1 < 5; j1++)
{
afb.ad(170, i1, 310, 30);
jfb[j1] = “~:” + ifb[j1];
efb[j1] = afb.jd(170, i1 - 7, (j1 + 1) + ": " + nhb[ifb[j1]], 1, true);
ffb[j1] = afb.yc(170, i1 + 7, 310, 30, 1, 80, false, true);
afb.ad(370, i1, 80, 30);
afb.jd(370, i1 - 7, “Different”, 1, true);
afb.jd(370, i1 + 7, “Question”, 1, true);
gfb[j1] = afb.md(370, i1, 80, 30);
afb.ad(455, i1, 80, 30);
afb.jd(455, i1 - 7, “Enter own”, 1, true);
afb.jd(455, i1 + 7, “Question”, 1, true);
hfb[j1] = afb.md(455, i1, 80, 30);
i1 += 35;
}

	afb.nc(ffb[0]);
	i1 += 10;
	afb.ad(256, i1, 250, 30);
	afb.jd(256, i1, "Click here when finished", 4, true);
	cfb = afb.md(256, i1, 250, 30);
}[/code]
